name: tm-radial-tree
description: Web component tm-radial-tree is for displaying a tree of data radially.
author: tm-radial-tree

scripts.build: npm run release:build && npm run site:build
scripts.site:rebuild: npm run site:clean && npm run site:build
scripts.site:deploy: git subtree push --prefix dist/site origin gh-pages
scripts.site:watch: npm run site:build && rollup --watch -c rollup-site.config.js && npm run site:serve
scripts.release:deploy: git subtree push --prefix dist/release origin release
